meanings.definition: The act of killing someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The slayings in the story were done by the evil dragon.
meanings.sent2: The detective was investigating a series of mysterious slayings in the town.
meanings.sent3: The slayings in the movie were so exaggerated, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The slayings of the old beliefs by the new ones marked a significant change.
meanings.sent5: The slayings in the legend were described in vivid detail.

meanings.definition: The killing of a person or animal in a violent way.
meanings.sent1: The slayings of innocent animals by the poachers angered the conservationists.
meanings.sent2: The slayings of the soldiers in the battle were a tragic loss.
meanings.sent3: The slayings in the horror movie made the audience jump in their seats.
meanings.sent4: The slayings of hope by despair left a heavy atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The slayings in the news report were described with chilling detail.
